original_text: So then, if she has sexual relations with another man while her husband is still alive, she is called an adulteress. But if her husband dies, she is released from that law and is not an adulteress if she marries another man.
korean_text: 그러므로 만일 그 남편 생전에 다른 남자에게 가면 음녀라 그러나 만일 남편이 죽으면 그 법에서 자유롭게 되나니 다른 남자에게 갈지라도 음녀가 되지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: So then, if she has sexual relations with another man
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 만일 그 여자가 다른 남자와 성관계를 맺으면

sentences.original_text: while her husband is still alive
she is released from that law
